metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1251 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
There is a vulnerability of type use-after-free affecting DBD::mysql (aka DBD-mysql or the Database Interface (DBI) MySQL driver for Perl) 3.x and 4.x before 4.041 when used with mysql_server_prepare=1.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1251` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libdbd-mysql-perl - 4.041-2build1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> only an issue with mysql_server_prepare=1, which is not the default.

criterions.comment: libdbd-mysql-perl package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.041-2build1').
